title: Props
text: The component has the following props with the given default values. Please visit types page for detailed type definitions.

data.name: size
data.description: Controls the size of the default close icon within the button.

data.name: ariaLabel
data.description: Provides an accessible label for the close button, improving accessibility for screen readers.
